doc.after: Her next major discovery was a partial skeleton of a new type of marine reptile in the winter of 1820 1821 the first of its kind to be found William Conybeare named it Plesiosaurus near lizard because he thought it more like modern reptiles than the ichthyosaur had been and he described it in the same 1821 paper he co authored with Henry De la Beche on ichthyosaur anatomy The paper thanked the man who bought the skeleton from Anning for giving Conybeare access to it but does not mention the woman who discovered and prepared it 53 56 The fossil was subsequently described as Plesiosaurus dolichodeirus and is the type specimen holotype of the species which itself is the type species of the genus
